remarks:
The first member of an ordered pair of classes in a Cartesian product belongs to first Cartesian product argument.  (Contributed by NM, 28-May-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.) 

---

 The first member of an ordered pair of classes in a cross product belongs to first cross product argument.  (Contributed by NM, 28-May-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
statement: opelxp1 $p |- ( <. A , B >. e. ( C X. D ) -> A e. C ) $.
